full_text: Razorpay has been in high-growth mode since day one. With a young, mobile-first India, businesses of every shape and size are expanding across the country and beyond. From India‚Äôs largest corporations to a small store in Lucknow selling kurtis, coffee estates in Coorg shipping some of the best beans nationwide, to grandmothers selling homemade papads from Kallidakurichi, the sheer diversity of entrepreneurs going all-in is incredible. Being front-row to this slow-brewing transformation is an experience in itself. And behind so many of these stories, Razorpay is the engine powering their payments.

full_text: I love trying new restaurants and there seem to be a new one opening almost every day in Bangalore. Recently, I visited Kopitiam Lah, probably the only Malaysian restaurant in the city, and easily one of the best. The food is outstanding! Bold flavours, beautifully balanced dishes, and that comforting warmth you only get when someone cooks with real heart. Their Kaya Toast, Nasi Lemak and Rendang are the kind of dishes that transport you to a different culture but stay with you long after the meal is over.
author: Feed post

Recently, I visited Kopitiam Lah, probably the only Malaysian restaurant in the city, and easily one of the best. The food is outstanding! Bold flavours, beautifully balanced dishes, and that comforting warmth you only get when someone cooks with real heart. Their Kaya Toast, Nasi Lemak and Rendang are the kind of dishes that transport you to a different culture but stay with you long after the meal is over.
